title: Pharmaceutical sector growth worldwide 2017 - 2030 , by country
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Growth in percentage in the y axis.
The Growth in percentage is highest at Country India and lowest at Country Japan.
The difference of Growth in percentage between the highest and lowest Country is 115.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Growth in percentage in the y axis.
Country India has the highest Growth in percentage and Japan has the lowest Growth in percentage.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Growth in percentage in the y axis.
The Growth in percentage is highest at Country India and lowest at Country Japan.
The difference of Growth in percentage between the highest and lowest Country is 115.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Growth in percentage for 20 number of Countrys.
The Growth in percentage is appeared to be the highest at Country India and lowest at Country Japan.
Country China has the second highest value for Growth in percentage.
There is a difference of 115.0 between the maximum Country India and minimum Country Japan.
The Country India has the highest Growth in percentage, followed by China, and Indonesia. Down to the Country Japan which is the lowest.
Country Spain, and France share the same value 129.0.
The highest value 232.0 at India is almost 1.52 times larger than the average value 152.55.
